---
I want you to respond only in language [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Help me make an introduction for Experience Descriptions on my LinkedIn profile based on these description:
[PROMPT]
[TARGETLANGUAGE]
(Job Title) for (Company Name)
(Company Name) is a (describe it in 2 sentences)
(Your job description and responsibility...)
(Your achievement during the job period...)
